original_title: The Exhibitionist: Outdoor Displays of Lust
overview: These exhibitionists are taking sex to the great outdoors! Join Alexa Tomas, Cristal Caitlin, Alexis Crystal, Sandy Ambrosia and Anita Bellini as they exploit their bodies in beautiful public locales. Enjoy 5 expertly crafted scenes and embrace the thrill of sex in the outdoors!
title: The Exhibitionist: Outdoor Displays of Lust
